summary: Initially hired on as a Student Associate for two semesters through the cooperative education program at the University of South Florida. Shadowed a senior software engineer and created goals to work towards. Transitioned to full-time employment after graduation and received a promotion in recognition of outstanding performance as a Student Associate. Took on higher level developer responsibilities and continued to set goals with technical leads to deliver quality results and further professional development.

positions.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Designed (wireframes and mockups) and implemented web apps from start to finish.
Enhanced a production system's UI with new features and performance improvements augmenting operator workflows.
Added new impactful capabilities to a mature Service-Oriented Architecture using Java
Coordinated internal software releases among team members for testing and expediting bug fixes. Clients received new software releases roughly every month as a result.
Engaged in meetings and scrums to gauge tasking priorities, ask questions, and offer suggestions for new features and improvements.
Contributed new ideas for proposals and technical breakdowns for white papers.

positions.title: Student Associate
bullets: Contributed to a successful technical demonstration, resulting in additional funding for a project.
Developed a UI feature improvement in Javascript that enhanced the user friendliness of a system.
Prepared documentation and slides for various projects, of which one was made an internal standard for an SRI capability.
